description_html: KOSE more than lives up to its name. A collection consisting of a stacking café armchair and collapsible dining table, KOSE addresses the needs of both indoor and outdoor use. Each element is lightweight, comfortable, and durable against the elements. Each piece boasts unique blob-shaped perforations in its powder-coated aluminium form, allowing for water to flow through the chair and table rather than accumulate. The collection strikes an iconic, minimal silhouette, serving elegance while remaining affordable. Simultaneously embodying firmness and flexibility, KOSE represents the NOW.
